name: ONCOMING
description:
ONCOMING

Rate it on our LDJam page - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/oncoming

You wake up driving in the wrong direction on the highway, how long can you survive before you inevitably crash and explode into a massive fireball?

Controls:

WASD / Arrows / Thumbstick - Drive
Spacebar / Any Face button - Use Item

Features:

  • Custom soundtrack
  • Various Items
  • Artillery Canon
  • Ramp
  • Plow
  • N64-style 3D models
  • Many Explosions
  • A global leaderboard!

Plz report bugs.

https://globalstats.io/leaderboard/624af2df5f5e88c1a18b4605?page=1&sort_by=longd...
